name: Artificial intelligence
title: Artificial intelligence (AI) refers to the simulation
details: Artificial intelligence is based on the principle that human intelligence can be defined in a way that a machine can easily mimic it and execute tasks, from the most simple to those that are even more complex. The goals of artificial intelligence include mimicking human cognitive activity. Researchers and developers in the field are making surprisingly rapid strides in mimicking activities such as learning, reasoning, and perception, to the extent that these can be concretely defined. Some believe that innovators may soon be able to develop systems that exceed the capacity of humans to learn or reason out any subject. But others remain skeptical because all cognitive activity is laced with value judgments that are subject to human experience.

name: Cyber Security
title: Privacy: If this isn't an issue for you
details: Cyber security is a discipline that covers how to defend devices and services from electronic attacks by nefarious actors such as hackers, spammers, and cybercriminals. While some components of cyber security are designed to strike first, most of today's professionals focus more on determining the best way to defend all assets, from computers and smartphones to networks and databases, from attacks. Cyber security has been used as a catch-all term in the media to describe the process of protection against every form of cybercrime, from identity theft to international digital weapons. These labels are valid, but they fail to capture the true nature of cyber security for those without a computer science degree or experience in the digital industry.

name: Network Technology

name: 3d Animation

details: 3D Animator is a smart profession due to the proliferation of visual media including movies, games, videos. name: Blockchain Technology
title: Trendy course on cloud computing platform
details: Blockchain technology is currently considered as a novel and groundbreaking innovation. It is the most secure and open method of data storage ever invented. Using this method, the necessary information can be stored in different blocks one after the other in the form of a chain. Since its invention, Blockchain has been gaining popularity all over the world as it has no fear of data hacking, real-time settlement capability and multiple applications.As blockchain is a very secure and fast technology, the use of this new technology is increasing day by day in various public and private sectors including banking, commerce, healthcare, insurance, industry.Besides, the course has the opportunity of practical classes. So do not delay and secure your career in this new technology sector by enrolling today.
